i love my pet dog more than anything.

content.text: My dog is my best friend. What about you?
My dog is my best friend since my cat passed away.
Sorry to hear that about your cat. I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love folk metal. What kind of music do you like?
I don't really like waking up early. What about you?
I'm not a morning person either. But I try to stay active and keep my mind busy to avoid feeling anxious.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill. Do you cook?
I love to cook! I'm a movie buff who has a passion for collecting memorabilia from my favorite films. What are some of your hobbies?
I'm not going to go the extra mile anymore. I'm content with the way my life is.
I'm happy with my weight and would love to have lunch with Quentin Tarantino. What's your favorite movie?
I don't really have a favorite movie. I just like to watch movies.
